name: Assassin's Creed

files.install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG

input_menu.description: Choose the DirectX version for the game:

task.description: Installing the Game (WARNING: Do not run the game when the installation is complete)
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/GOG.com/Assassins Creed/$INPUT_API
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose the DirectX version for the game:'
    id: API
    options:
    - AssassinsCreed_Dx9.exe: DirectX 9
    - AssassinsCreed_Dx10.exe: DirectX 10
    preselect: AssassinsCreed_Dx9.exe
- task:
    description: 'Installing the Game (WARNING: Do not run the game when the installation
      is complete)'
    executable: install
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: false
